infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show your real-time position on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to your location to show your real-time position on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location at all times to provide accurate navigation.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to choose images.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: This app needs access to your location to show your position on the map.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: This app needs access to your location while using the app.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: This app needs access to your location at all times for accurate tracking.
